page.title: 11OUR VILLAGE POLICEMAN.
page.content: Rhuallt Police Station stands a short distance to the west of the school. The village policeman is P.C.Watson. {His area covers Rhuallt,Cwm,Bodfari {and Tremeirchion. His working day lasts for 8 hours(Day Shift 9.00a.m._5.00p.m.,Evening Shift 6.00p.m._2.00a.m.).Occasionally he has to work in the police stations at Rhyl Prestatyn and St.Asaph. This latter is his"base"station which he contacts to inquire whether there are any specific jobs that day.If not he will do bookwork,involving reports on the contents of his pocketbook etc. He may travel to St.Asaph to pick up a car,used to visit other villages.Most of his duty time is spent in Rhuallt. Radio contact is maintained through Colwyn Bay Headquarters which covers the Chester/Anglesey/Dolgellau areas. Local courts are held in Prestayn.
